patthana16.51:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.51:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
